tool.name: Deliver Results
tool.description: Tarball an annotation area and move it to ftp.

param.name: project_name
param.label: Project Name
param.help: Name of project residing in /usr/local/annotation/ to deliver

param.name: delete
param.label: --delete
param.help: BE VERY SURE YOU WANT TO DO THIS.
param.option: Remove everything after delivery to ftp.

tool.help: This tool will create a tarball of the entire directory for the project named at /mnt/galaxyData/tmp/ftp/[username].
